doc.content:
Possum pies and other meals made from the ubiquitous Kiwi pest have Australian animal-rights activists in a stew.
Possum dishes such as Road Kill, Headlight Delight Pie, Guess That Mess and Shovel-Flipped Roadside Pizza have incensed Animal Liberation Victoria (ALV).
President Patty Mark said New Zealanders' treatment of possums was an outrage and the culinary names "make your stomach turn".
